"Create a virtual reality cooking experience where users can cook meals from all over the world in a realistic kitchen setting."
"Design an app that uses artificial intelligence to suggest personalized meal plans based on a user's dietary preferences, health goals, and lifestyle."
"Develop a smart kitchen gadget that can automatically adjust cooking temperatures and times based on the type of food being cooked."
"Create a social media platform where home cooks can share their recipes and cooking tips with other users around the world."
